Articles.Content: Hi everyone, I have modded my game with realism overhaul (all the mods I have come with RO) and have also added Kerbal Alarm Clock and Kerbal Engineer Redux. Staging in the atmosphere, as I thrust my way into space works fine. The problem I'm getting is when I stage (press space) for the first time in space. After that I can still stage but decouplers eject parts with 0 force, engines look and sound as if they work but provide no thrust, and I have no other control over the satellite except for staging. Going through all of my remaining stages doesn't help. However, the satellite is still being propelled by some constant "phantom" force, even long after my engines "burn out". My speed keeps dropping but apoapsis goes up and periapsis down, I can't time warp because the game recognizes the "phantom" acceleration. I have checked and I still have plenty of electricity left and the signal is not the problem either. Doing anything in space seems impossible this way. Does anybody know how to fix this?
